p:
There is no specific cure for SARS-CoV-2 infection and lots of therapies are being under investigation (Remdesivir, Favipiravir, Lopinavir/Ritonavir, Ribavirin, Umifenovir, IFN-Î±, Nitazoxanide, Camostat mesylate, Chloroquine, Hydroxychloroquine, Anti-inflammatory tocilizumab, Steroids, Anticytokine or immunomodulatory agents, and immunoglobulin therapy etc.)
